abstract: N Y Times geog sectional pub opinion survey
snippet: BOSTON, Aug. 31--There have been no important shifts of opinion on any of the questions relating to the war in the past few months in New England....

headline.main: OPINION HERE REFLECTS RISING TEMPO OF WAR; NEBRASKAN

lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Aug. 31--There have been no important shifts of opinion on any of the questions relating to the war in the past few months in New England.
